articles.title: World Bank raises PHL growth forecast to 5.3% - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: THE WORLD BANK raised its Philippine growth forecast for this year to 5.3% following the economy’s faster-than-expected expansion in the third quarter, it said in its East Asia and the Pacific (EAP) economic update report released on Tuesday.
